title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: STEPN is a Web3 way of life programming that incorporates Game-Fi and Social-Fi highlights. STEPN depends on moving around, and clients are furnished with NFTs as Shoes.STEPN (GMT) Price Prediction 2022The GMT price was swinging from $0.6350 to $0.7138 subsequent to going to its most reduced of the month at $0.6331. Quickly returning from the help level, GMT is currently going sideways, and we can anticipate that the market should break out from the sideway soon.In the meantime, our drawn-out GMT price prediction for 2022 is bullish in the event that it can't break the help level. We can anticipate that GMT should reach $1.2 this year.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: That's pretty hard to predict it but i can assume if we will be seeing another bitcoin halving that may possible to create another big pump again in the future. The remaining bitcoins to be minted by miners are slowly going down. That means bitcoin will become a deflationary coin. Im sure that will give a very big bullish trend to the market and expecting new ATH from GMT makes sense when such moment will come in the future.

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.body: I think this move to earn project will die in few years. They had a good mission of helping people to be more fit and active, with rewards for activity. But since people started to cheat (share devices or hire people to walk instead of them) it was just a matter of time before this pyramid was about to collapse. It is just a trend. As soon as people stop earning decent profit, they will stop walking. No one would intentionally walk for free. The growing amount of competitors or imitators are only helping StepN to die. I assume GMT price to stay flat for 6-12 months, with small jumps everytime they release updates, followed by a death or project becomes abandoned in 2025.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: There is no guarantee that this token will still exist in 2030, so there is no point in trying to predict its price in the future. But already now we can see that the largest profit was received by the first Stepn investors at the expense of those who joined later and thus it becomes more like a ponzi scheme.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: With Play to Earn, Run to Earn tokens, the longer time you hold it, the more risk you will get.With time, more players or runners join and they earn more tokens so that they create more selling pressure on market. Even if number of gamers or runners reaches its peak and drops after that, selling pressure from previous gamers or runners is still exist.I don't think it is realistic to predict price of STEPN till 2030 and we even don't know will that project be lively in 2030, not mention the token price yet.
